/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a yellow and black striped median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, mostly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene.
